uiDefinition.description: Specify the license key for the Power Automate for WPForms plugin. (Find in WPForms > Settings > Integrations)
uiDefinition.tooltip: Copy this from the WPForms > Settings > Integrations page.

uiDefinition.description: Specify the secret key for the Power Automate for WPForms plugin. (Find in WPForms > Settings > Integrations)
uiDefinition.tooltip: Copy this from the WPForms > Settings > Integrations page.

uiDefinition.description: Specify the website URL for Power Automate connection. (Find in WPForms > Settings > Integrations)
uiDefinition.tooltip: Copy this from the WPForms > Settings > Integrations page.

properties.description: Connect your WordPress forms powered by WPForms to the Power Platform.
